scripts.predeploy: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file serverless-output.yaml --s3-bucket modofun-example-src
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file serverless-output.yaml --stack-name modofunExample --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.postdeploy: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name modofunExample --query Stacks[0].Outputs --output text
